column4: how can I make my 5 key mouse work right, I can't use those additional buttons now
I am unsure of your mouse brand, but this is for Logitech

Howdy Guys, Having a little disk trouble.. Using qtparted I formatted my second hard disk, which used to house a single Partition on NTFS, It now shows under qtparted as Unknown Type, yet when I retry formatting it again to ext3 I will assign it, but when I hit Commit it wont stay, any ideas?
